body.name: Downy Eco-Box Ultra Concentrated Laundry Fabric Conditioner Liquid, Free & Gentle, 180 Loads, 105 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 27 mins
features: Same great Downy in a smarter, easy-to-store package
Compact packaging made with 75% less plastic
Liquid formula made with 100% renewable wind power electricity
Made with 30% less water for more conditioning ingredients per drop
Soften and freshen your clothes with hypoallergenic and dermatologist tested Downy Free & Gentle
body.description: Downy eco-box is the same liquid Fabric Softener that you love, now in smarter package! Made with 30% less water, its re-engineered formula gives you more softening power per drop than Downy Original liquid Fabric Softener, plus it's hypoallergenic, Dermatologist Tested, and free of dyes and perfumes. Smaller and easier to store, it's compressed into a shipping-safe package Made from 75% less plastic and features a no-drip tap to help minimize any leaks and spills. To assemble The Downy eco-box liquid Fabric enhancer, simply pull the tab on the side of the pack to reveal the tap and dosing cup. But the best part: it's easy to use! All you have to do is twist the blue knob counterclockwise to dispense the desired amount of laundry softener into the dosing cup. Make sure to twist slowly so the softener doesn't come out too quickly. Per oz vs. 2 x 51 oz bottles Downy Free & Gentle Liquid Fabric conditioner (Fabric Softener) eco-box, he compatible, 105 fl oz 180 loads

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for me!
reviews.reviewText: Saves on plastic & works really well & a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Downy for the win
reviews.reviewText: I have always been a loyal fan of downy. I've tried cheaper brands, but I still keep coming back to Downy. I started buying the concentrated bottles but found the scent started to bother me so I looked in store for the free and clear. Target does sell the eco box but only in the cotton smell which is awful. The store associate showed me how to check the nozzle to ensure its facing down, and said they just don't carry the free and clear. I got my shipment next day. It was well packaged no leaks. I made sure to pull out the nozzle carefully and even peeked at the bag inside.i washed two blankets for myself and my dog. No scent beyond tide ,and they are fluffy. The eco box takes up less space on my laundry shelf and it is not overly heavy. I am 100% a fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I had given a favorable review for the product BUT the packaging makes it difficult to use and causes a lot of wasted product. When trying to pour out the product, the fluid squirts all over the area due to the pressure fluid packaging and the "dispenser". The consistancy of the liquid has improved but still requires a lot of additional water to prevent the product from turning into the consistency of cornstarch during the washing process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall a good product and packaging solution
reviews.reviewText: I really like the less plastic packaging. Having corrugated cardboard is sooooo much better for the environment & recycles easily in most places.Those who complain about it's use being difficult need to stop for a moment, read the directions and go from there. Once and a while the spout will begin to clog. It is easy to clean, just turn the box upside down, use a small implement (toothpick, chopstick, whatever to scoop the thick bit out. Open the spout and visually ensure the drain area is now clear. CLOSE THE SPOUT or you will make a giant mess. Turn right side up and use as normal.If the spout as gotten gunked up, your machine may have too. If you have a tub clean cycle, you should use it at least as often as recommended by the manufacturer. ALL softeners (and the "dissolvable" pod casings for many detergents) can leave deposits and if not routinely cleaned they can end up ruining a machine - for most people. If you don't mind totally disassembling all the parts in which the fluids travel, then you can fix it yourself. Better to clean the tub and dispensers regularly to forgo having an issue at all.I do agree things get a bit fussy about 3/4 the way down. You may have to tilt the box or jiggle it. I've found it you pull one corner of the bag up through the hole made for the measuring cup & use a binder clip to secure it to the top it helps a ton!But seriously, how hard is it to move a little more, it give you a teensy bit more excercise with every load 🙂The softener itself is wonderful. It doesn't annoy my skin, it is easy to use and generally works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Okay, first of all this saves soo much plastic from our beautiful planet, honestly its about time! I save money, i dont have to go to the store, and it makes me feel really good about the fact my parents dont have to carry this stuff from the store to the car and then into the house, the box lakes up less room than the bottles that were accustomed to, it sits there on the shelf with a convenient 1/4 turn valve at the bottom of the box so that we don't ever have to pick it up. just twist measure and pour. that alone is good enough of a reason never to look back, i hope that you find this helpful, happy cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s the nozzle for me!
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. I have crazy sensitive skin and a really good sense of smell so I neeeeed fabric softener that’s not going to smell like anything. I started using Downey Free about a year ago and am really thrilled with the result. I’ve never been able to use fabric softener before this. I was intrigued by the packaging because plastics are going to ruin the oceans, seriously. So when this arrived it took a minute to figure out how to set up the box. Once I got it situated on top of my washing machine I noticed that there’s no need to use the cup! I can just open the spout and fill the fabric softener receptacle on my washing machine - it’s magical. Love the product, and will continue to purchase it in this packaging as long as it’s still being made this way. Excellent!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient to pour depends on laundry room setup
reviews.reviewText: This is the same product just in a different packaging. I actually prefer 2 things. 1.) it is about 30% less expensive than the plastic bottles. 2.) I love the packaging (well once you learn how to open it). My laundry products sit in a shelf above the W-D. This box has a spout with a nozzle that extends over the side of the shelf with a regulation knob. Never have to handle until empty.As I cautioned above this is only for someone that puts the product on a higher shelf and does not want to have to handle the plastic jug. Do not be surprised if you say a few words under your breath when opening for the first time but the end result is a well engineered container that costs less, is easier to handle with the same product.I have very sensitive skin and Downy free, clear and perfume free, is absolutely the only softener I use. Period. Purchase again: ABSOLUTELY.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023

reviews.reviewText: I use this to refill a small free and gentle bottle that we keep with the wash. It does not like to go straight down and its like a power hose. Not sure how you are supposed to fill the little cup straight from it without overfilling the cup?But for me it serves it's purpose perfectly.Easy to store and refills my bottle.This stuff is amazing! My partner failed to tell me for years that the perfume from normal fabric softener was causing a lot of skin irritation. . . But since we've started using this stuff soft clothes and noose skin irritation. It even works great on my babies clothes with no irritation tk her sensitive skin!

Finally, better packaging from Downy. Simple enough to use, tidy little cup holder on the top of the box. Price was good as well. I was frustrated with the downy bottle as it is impossible to get all the product out of the bottle. This packaging is easy enough to use all the product and recycle.
Great scent. However the dispenser and box malfunction often especially when getting low on product. The spout clogs and gravity doesn’t work to get product out you have to push on the bag.
Like that it is compact and I do not have to lift all the time. Works to keep static down and clothes soft. The nozzle gets clogged at times and the build up needs to be removed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Use in every load of laundry
